verses.text: Ixlajwi chi', te chaanh ix wab' yoch jun av: Cotokab' heb' ol ak'anoch yaelal t'a jun chonhab' tik, junjun heb' yet'nacokab' syamk'ab' yic owal yic satanel heb', xchi.

Ix wilani to ay wacwanh heb' winh winak ix och t'a yol jun niwan puerta ay t'a stojolal norte, junjun heb' winh yet'nac syamk'ab' b'aj smak'cham anima. Ha t'a skal heb' winh chi', ix wilpax scot jun winh ayoch spichul nab'a lino. Ha t'a snanhal winh, ata' ayoch syamk'ab' yic tz'ib'. Ix wilan yoch heb' winh, ix ochk'och heb' winh t'a slak'anil altar nab'a bronce.

Axo stziquiquial Jehová ko Diosal a onh israel onh tik ix k'e waan, ix el t'a yib'anh juntzanh yechel querubín, b'aj aytaxoneq'ui, ix kan t'a spuertail templo chi'. Ha Jehová chi' ix awtan jun winh ayoch pichul lino chi' yuj, aton jun winh ed'jinac yamk'ab' yic tz'ib' t'a snanhal.

Ix yalan Jehová chi' t'a winh icha tik: Ek'anh t'a masanil yol chonhab' Jerusalén tik, tzak'anoch yechel t'a snanhal sat masanil anima tz'ok' yuj chukal yajb'entac sk'ulej heb' anima t'a chonhab' tik, xchi.
Ixlajwi chi' ix wab'an yalanxi t'a heb' winh ed'jinac syamk'ab' yic owal chi': Ixiquec t'a spatictac winh chi', tzex ek' t'a kal chonhab' tik smasanil, mokab' ok' he k'ol t'a heb' anima, tze milcham

masanil heb' winh ichamtac winak, heb' winh kelemtac, heb' ix cob'estac, heb' ix ix yet' heb' unin, masanto manhxalaj junok heb' skani. Palta manh he milcham junok heb' ayoch yechel t'a snanhal chi'. Tze chael yich t'a in templo tik, xchi Jehová. Ix schaanel yich heb' winh smilancham heb' winh ichamtac winak ayek' t'a yamaq'uil templo chi'.

Ixlajwi chi', ix yalan Jehová t'a heb' winh icha tik: Ixtejequel templo tik, tzeyak'an b'ud'joc yamaq'uil yuj sniwanil heb' scham chi', slajwi chi' tzex b'ati, xchi. Ix wilan sb'at lemnaj heb' winh b'ian, ix och ijan heb' winh smilancham heb' anima t'a masanil yol chonhab' chi'.

Ayic wan smilancham heb' anima chi' heb' winh, a inxonhej in kan t'a yichanh Jehová, ix in em nhojan t'a sat lu'um, ix te kus in k'ool, yuj chi' ix el wav: Mamin Jehová Vajalil, ¿tom ol a satel masanil heb' aytocan t'a Israel yuj yowal a k'ol t'a Jerusalén tik? xin chi.

Ix tak'wi t'ayin icha tik: Ha wal smul heb' aj Israel yet' heb' aj Judá tik, yelxo wal te niwan. Yelxo wal b'ud'jinaquel yol juntzanh chonhab' chi' yuj sniwanil heb' anima smiljichamoc. Manhxa jab'oc tojolal sk'ulej heb'. Ha snaan heb' to toxo ix wactejkan jun nación tik, maxtzac wil tas sk'ulej heb' snaani.
Ha ticnaik maxtzac ok' in k'ol t'a heb', ol wak'xonhejoch syaelal heb' yuj masanil tas tz'el sk'ulani, xchi Jehová.

Ixlajwi chi', ix jax jun winh winak ayoch lino spichuloc chi', yet'nac pax yamk'ab' yic tz'ib' t'a snanhal, ix yalan winh icha tik: Mamin Vajalil, toxo ix in k'anab'ajej tas ix a chec in k'ulej, xchi winh.
